ygData.subject: EE's, research
ygData.msgSnippet: ... 312 for beserker strength and color shift spells.  Since I fail repeatedly at making them, and I see no one auctioning these pages, at this rate I will be
ygData.messageBody:
>
> Message: 6
> Date: Thu, 2 Mar 2000 21:29:52 -0600
> From: "Deryn Morin" <deryn@...>
> Subject: Level 20 research pages .. and evil eye .. questions
>
> Does anyone know the best mobs to look for to get Tasarin's pages 30 and
312 for beserker strength and color shift spells. Since I fail repeatedly
at making them, and I see no one auctioning these pages, at this rate I will
be level 30 before I have them.

My best luck for finding these was in Oasis on deepwater crocodiles. Easiest
option would be to do a /auction for the pages you want in the zone. I
usually offer 2pp for these. Lizards from the maze in Cazic Thule are also
good for these pages and the level 24 spell research pages (now if I can
just find about 10 faded velishouls so I can make feedback, finding all
kinds of necro research stuff off the level 31-33 goblin warriors in
HighKeep, but few enchanter items).

>
> And looking ahead a bit as well, where should I go for the level 24
research pages as well.
>
> My poor (and I mean 'broke') level 21 enchantress has CHA and INT both
just over 130. I am working hard on jewelcraft to try to fill in my (bare)
ear slots, and wrist slots in particular, but she currently sports damask or
leather or cloth underwear. A second question I have is .. at what level can
I successfully do Evil Eyes in the gorge (given the above stats, and with a
magic resist of 57).

At 24, I was soloing (no pet either) EE's without a problem. Under that,
your damage output may not be sufficient. Due to the charming the EE's do, I
would recommend not using a pet on them. Had a stein in one hand and a Skull
of Jhentra in the other (weapon, what's a weapon? really haven't used one
after level 22). Buff up with endure magic. Enthrall the pet, burn the EE
into the ground (WTYH is actully useful here), then mem blur the pet when
the eye is dead. Very important to tell anyone you are with not to touch the
pet (watching it slash itself for 32k always impresses people the first time
they see it). In the gorge, nearby critters will come and assist anything
you fight which is why the mino's jump in. The king room in the gorge (the
room with the big stone altar type thing and the 2 EE spawn spots) also has
some horrrible pathing issues. Putting up a pet there always attracted the
whole room on to me. It is one of those non pet friendly areas.

Lozi Candiman, level 30, ~Hand of Chaos~, CT
